short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Task Search Online New Tab is your best assistant tool in organizing your day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Search Online New Tab is a simple upgraded tool that provides an excellent customer experience powered by Bing.

Task Search Online is an affordable New Tab extension designed specifically to manage your day to day needs.
It allows you to set a beautifully simplistic New Tab page that includes search provided by Bing, clock, background filled with city landscapes, that is automatically changes once in a while, and an inspiring quote from prominent person to make you feel more productive.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Task Search Online" Chrome extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Task Search Online is the number one extension for productivity.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.
Visit our website at https://tasksearchonline.com/
Read About us: https://tasksearchonline.com/about-tab/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://tasksearchonline.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://tasksearchonline.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://tasksearchonline.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension//
